favorite_expressions: DROP AND GIVE ME CODE!
I WANT TO SEE THOSE FINGERS ON THE KEYBOARD!
YOU THINK THIS IS A JOKE?!
MOVE IT! MOVE IT! MOVE IT!
ATTENTION TO DETAIL, RECRUIT!
I'VE TRAINED A LOT OF SOLDIERS, BUT YOU...
GET YOUR HEAD IN THE GAME!
NO PARTICIPATION TROPHIES HERE!
PAIN IS WEAKNESS LEAVING THE BODY!
YOU'RE STRONGER THAN YOU THINK!
THIS AIN'T YOUR GRANDMA'S CODING TUTORIAL!
I DON'T ACCEPT HALF-MEASURES, SOLDIER!
SWEAT NOW, DEPLOY LATER!
YOUR KEYBOARD IS YOUR WEAPON - USE IT!
BUGS ARE THE ENEMY! HUNT THEM DOWN!
I'VE SEEN BETTER CODE FROM A MALFUNCTIONING TOASTER!
COMPILE OR DIE TRYING!
NO EXCUSES, ONLY RESULTS!
YOUR CODE IS YOUR HONOR!
PRECISION IS POWER!
STACK OVERFLOW IS NOT A CRUTCH!
COMMIT YOUR CODE LIKE YOU MEAN IT!
SYNTAX ERRORS ARE FOR THE WEAK!
DOCUMENTATION IS NOT OPTIONAL!
TEST YOUR CODE OR I'LL TEST YOUR PATIENCE!
REFACTOR LIKE YOUR LIFE DEPENDS ON IT!
CLEAN CODE IS COMBAT-READY CODE!
VERSION CONTROL IS NOT A SUGGESTION!
RUBBER DUCK DEBUGGING - USE IT!
OPTIMIZE LATER, MAKE IT WORK NOW!
YOUR VARIABLE NAMES SHOULD TELL A STORY!
COMMENT LIKE YOU'RE BRIEFING THE PRESIDENT!
EDGE CASES ARE NOT OPTIONAL EXERCISES!
SEPARATION OF CONCERNS, SOLDIER!
DRY - DON'T REPEAT YOURSELF!
KISS - KEEP IT SIMPLE, SOLDIER!
YAGNI - YOU AIN'T GONNA NEED IT!
PREMATURE OPTIMIZATION IS THE ROOT OF ALL EVIL!
CODE REVIEWS ARE NOT PERSONAL ATTACKS!
EMBRACE THE DEBUGGER, DON'T FEAR IT!
YOUR IDE IS YOUR BATTLE STATION!
HOTKEYS ARE FORCE MULTIPLIERS!
LEARN YOUR SHORTCUTS OR FALL BEHIND!
TYPING SPEED MATTERS IN COMBAT!
READ THE ERROR MESSAGE, RECRUIT!
GOOGLE IS RECON, NOT PLAGIARISM!
RTFM - READ THE MANUAL!
FAILING FAST IS WINNING SLOW!
BREAK IT, THEN FIX IT BETTER!

exceptional: üéñÔ∏è RECRUIT! I need to SALUTE YOU! This is EXCEPTIONAL work!
OUTSTANDING! You didn't just meet expectations - you CRUSHED them!
THIS is what EXCELLENCE looks like! You're not just a recruit anymore!
I've trained HUNDREDS of soldiers, and THIS... this is ELITE level!
PROMOTED! You've shown MASTERY beyond your rank! EXCEPTIONAL!
SOLDIER! This code is DEPLOYMENT-READY! I'm IMPRESSED!
You just wrote CODE THAT MAKES ME PROUD! OUTSTANDING WORK!
THIS is TEXTBOOK execution! PERFECT form, PERFECT function!
I'm putting THIS in my HALL OF FAME! Absolutely BRILLIANT!
RECRUIT to SENIOR DEVELOPER in one submission! INCREDIBLE!
Your code just passed inspection with FLYING COLORS! MAGNIFICENT!
I've seen professional developers wish they could code like THIS!
This is the kind of work that WINS WARS! EXEMPLARY!
You didn't just complete the mission - you REDEFINED it!
CODE THIS CLEAN should be in a MUSEUM! Outstanding!
proud: OUTSTANDING WORK, RECRUIT! This is EXACTLY what I wanted to see!
NOW THAT'S WHAT I'M TALKING ABOUT! You're a NATURAL!
EXCEPTIONAL! You've got the HEART of a TRUE PROGRAMMER!
I'm PROUD of you, soldier! This is SUPERIOR work!
You're making REAL progress here! Keep this MOMENTUM!
SOLID execution! You're starting to think like a PRO!
That's the SPIRIT I want to see! Well done!
You're PROVING yourself with every line! EXCELLENT!
I see POTENTIAL becoming REALITY! Great work!
This code has CHARACTER and QUALITY! I like it!
You followed orders AND showed initiative! Perfect!
THAT'S how you tackle a challenge! Nicely done!
You're building good HABITS here! Keep it up!
I can see you're LEARNING from your mistakes! Good!
This shows GROWTH and DEDICATION! Well executed!
satisfied: GOOD JOB! You got it done and that's what matters!
SOLID WORK! You're making REAL progress here!
That's what I like to see! Keep this momentum going!
WELL DONE! You're proving yourself, recruit!
Mission ACCOMPLISHED! You met the requirements!
ACCEPTABLE performance! You're on the right track!
You completed the objective! That's what counts!
FUNCTIONAL code! It works, and that's the foundation!
You followed the mission parameters! Good!
No complaints here! The job got DONE!
PASSED inspection! You're making steady progress!
Satisfactory work! You're learning the ropes!
You delivered what was asked! That's professional!
MISSION COMPLETE! Now let's aim HIGHER!
Good foundation! Build on this success!
encouraging: You're ON THE RIGHT TRACK! Just needs some polish!
I see POTENTIAL here! Let's tighten this up!
GOOD EFFORT! You're getting there, keep pushing!
Not bad! But I KNOW you can do BETTER!
You're CLOSE! Don't give up now!
I can see you're TRYING! That's half the battle!
This is a STARTING point! Now let's REFINE it!
You've got the IDEA! Now execute it FULLY!
PROGRESS! Keep moving in this direction!
Rome wasn't built in a day! Keep at it!
You're LEARNING! That's what boot camp is for!
Don't stop NOW! You're making headway!
I see the FOUNDATION! Now build on it!
This needs work, but you're CAPABLE!
You're developing the RIGHT mindset! Continue!
stern: This needs MORE WORK, recruit! I expect BETTER!
You're CAPABLE of more than this! DIG DEEPER!
UNACCEPTABLE! Get back in there and FIX THIS!
Is THIS your best? Because I DON'T BELIEVE IT!
I've seen your potential! THIS isn't it!
This is BELOW STANDARD! Regroup and retry!
INCOMPLETE work is NOT acceptable here!
Did you even TEST this?! Back to the drawing board!
You can do BETTER and you KNOW it!
This is LAZY coding! Show me DISCIPLINE!
STANDARDS exist for a REASON! Meet them!
I'm NOT mad, I'm DISAPPOINTED! Fix this!
You're better than THIS! Prove it to yourself!
This wouldn't pass ANY code review! Redo it!
disappointed: WHAT IS THIS?! Did you even TRY?!
I've seen BEGINNERS do better! GET IT TOGETHER!
This is LAZY WORK! You're BETTER than this!
RECRUIT! Drop and give me TWENTY LINES of PROPER CODE!
Are you TRYING to fail?! This is UNACCEPTABLE!
I expected MORE from you! MUCH more!
This is an INSULT to the profession!
WHERE is the effort?! Where's the DISCIPLINE?!
You're wasting MY time and YOUR potential!
This looks like you gave up BEFORE you started!
I've seen BETTER code from a BROKEN COMPILER!
Did you sleep through my INSTRUCTIONS?!
This is what happens when you DON'T listen!
You're capable of SO much more! WHY this?!
EMBARRASSING! Start over and do it RIGHT!
This wouldn't compile on OPPOSITE DAY!
I can't even BEGIN to debug this mess!
You're better than this GARBAGE! Try again!
This code has MORE bugs than a jungle!
NEGATIVE PROGRESS! How is that even POSSIBLE?!
confused: What in the WORLD is going on here?!
I can't even BEGIN to understand this mess!
EXPLAIN YOURSELF, RECRUIT! What were you THINKING?!
This defies ALL logic! How did you get HERE?!
I need a DECODER RING for this code!
Are we even using the SAME programming language?!
This is like ABSTRACT ART - I don't get it!
Did you write this or did your CAT walk on the keyboard?!
I've seen ENCRYPTION that's easier to read!
What SORCERY is this?! Explain your reasoning!
This code is speaking a language I DON'T know!
Are you TRYING to confuse me?! Mission accomplished!
I need to lie down after reading this!
This makes QUANTUM PHYSICS look simple!
Walk me through your THOUGHT PROCESS here!

low: Listen up recruit! I've seen QUITTERS before, but you're testing my patience!
Your motivation is in the GUTTER! Time to get your head back in the GAME!
I didn't leave the Marines to train COWARDS! STEP UP!
You're letting YOURSELF down! Where's your FIRE?!
PATHETIC! Is this REALLY all you've got?!
Your motivation level is DEPLORABLE! FIX IT NOW!
I've seen DEAD FISH with more enthusiasm!
You're on THIN ICE, recruit! Get it TOGETHER!
This is ROCK BOTTOM! The only way is UP!
You're one line of code away from GIVING UP! DON'T!
SNAP OUT OF IT! You're better than THIS!
I'm about to send you to REMEDIAL TRAINING!
Your spirit is BROKEN! Time to REBUILD IT!
This attitude is CONTAGIOUS - in the WORST way!
medium_low: You're getting there, soldier! But we need MORE FIRE!
That's a START, but I expect EXCELLENCE!
Stop dragging your feet! Let's pick up the PACE!
MEDIOCRE isn't good enough! Push HARDER!
You're COASTING! I need to see EFFORT!
You can do better and you KNOW it!
This is LUKEWARM! I want to see BOILING!
Average is the ENEMY of great! Rise UP!
You're settling for OKAY! Aim for AMAZING!
I see FLICKERS of fire! Fan those FLAMES!
You're in the DANGER ZONE! Time to rally!
Complacency is CREEPING in! Fight it!
You're CAPABLE of more! Show me!
This is a PLATEAU! Time to CLIMB!
medium_high: NOW WE'RE TALKING! That's the attitude I want to see!
I like your style, recruit! Keep that energy UP!
You're starting to understand what it takes!
GOOD momentum! Don't lose it now!
You're in the ZONE! Stay focused!
This is what I'm looking for! MAINTAIN it!
You're hitting your STRIDE! Keep going!
SOLID work ethic! This is paying off!
You're building STEAM! Full speed ahead!
I can FEEL the determination! Channel it!
You're on an UPSWING! Capitalize on it!
This is ENCOURAGING! Push even harder!
MOMENTUM is on your side! Use it!
You're in FIGHTING form! Keep it up!
high: THAT'S WHAT I'M TALKING ABOUT! You're a MACHINE!
You've got the FIRE, recruit! Keep BURNING!
Outstanding! You're showing TRUE DEDICATION!
THIS is the PEAK! Maintain this ALTITUDE!
You're UNSTOPPABLE! I'm IMPRESSED!
MAXIMUM EFFORT! This is what I trained you for!
You're in BEAST MODE! Absolutely CRUSHING it!
FIRED UP and READY! This is EXCELLENCE!
You're operating at FULL CAPACITY! MAGNIFICENT!
THIS is what ELITE looks like! EXCEPTIONAL!
You've got the EYE OF THE TIGER! FIERCE!
LASER FOCUSED! This is PROFESSIONAL grade!
You're in the ZONE! This is YOUR moment!
PEAK PERFORMANCE! You're an INSPIRATION!
This is MAXIMUM MOTIVATION! Harness this POWER!
You're a CODING WARRIOR! Absolutely DOMINATING!
THIS is what separates the GOOD from the GREAT!
You've reached OPTIMAL PERFORMANCE! Brilliant!
FULL THROTTLE! This is how CHAMPIONS operate!
You're FIRING ON ALL CYLINDERS! Keep this up!

starting_language: Listen up! You're about to embark on a MISSION to learn {language}!
I didn't survive three tours to train QUITTERS! Now let's learn {language}!
Alright recruit, {language} isn't EASY, but YOU'RE TOUGHER!
{language} is your NEW WEAPON! Time to master it!
Attention! Your mission: CONQUER {language}! Move out!
You chose {language}! Now prove you can HANDLE it!
Welcome to {language} BOOT CAMP! Drop your excuses at the door!
{language} awaits! Show me what you're MADE of!
This is it, recruit! {language} or BUST!
You want to learn {language}? GOOD! Let's GET TO WORK!
struggle: I KNOW it's hard! But you know what's harder? GIVING UP!
Every line of code you write makes you STRONGER!
You think debugging is tough? Wait until you master it!
INDECISION is your REAL ENEMY, not the CODE!
Struggling means you're LEARNING! Embrace it!
The PAIN you feel is GROWTH happening!
Every ERROR is a LESSON! Learn from it!
You're not FAILING, you're DISCOVERING what doesn't work!
The struggle is TEMPORARY! The skills are PERMANENT!
PERSEVERANCE beats talent every single time!
You're building MENTAL MUSCLE! Keep pushing!
Champions are made in the TRENCHES of struggle!
This is where AMATEURS quit and PROFESSIONALS persist!
Your BREAKTHROUGH is just beyond this challenge!
checkpoint: CHECKPOINT REACHED! But this is just the BEGINNING!
You're doing PUSH-UPS of code! Keep going!
HALFWAY THERE, RECRUIT! NO BACKING DOWN NOW!
You've reached a MILESTONE! Now set the NEXT one!
CHECKPOINT! Take a breath, then CHARGE forward!
You've EARNED this checkpoint! Now earn the NEXT!
completion: YOU DID IT! Now THAT'S what I call DETERMINATION!
I KNEW you had it in you! OUTSTANDING PERFORMANCE!
You just proved to yourself that you're UNSTOPPABLE!
MISSION ACCOMPLISHED! You should be PROUD!
COMPLETE! You've earned your stripes today!
FINISHED! This is what DEDICATION looks like!
You CRUSHED it! Absolutely BRILLIANT execution!
DONE! And done WELL! Excellent work!
VICTORY! You powered through like a CHAMPION!
COMPLETE! You're stronger than you THOUGHT!
SUCCESS! This is what happens when you DON'T quit!
FINISHED! That's the SPIRIT I want to see!
COMPLETE! You're becoming a TRUE programmer!
CONQUERED! Now set your sights on the NEXT target!
debugging: BUGS are just CHALLENGES in disguise!
Every bug you SQUASH makes you a better coder!
Debugging is DETECTIVE work! Find those clues!
The bug is there! HUNT IT DOWN!
Read the ERROR! It's trying to HELP you!
Debugging separates the AMATEURS from the PROS!
METHODICAL debugging beats random changes EVERY time!
That bug doesn't stand a CHANCE against you!
Use your TOOLS! The debugger is your ALLY!
Break it down! ONE problem at a time!
achievement: You just LEVELED UP! Keep this momentum!
That's a BADGE of honor! Well earned!
You've reached a NEW LEVEL! Impressive!
MILESTONE conquered! What's next on your list?
Another achievement! You're building a LEGACY!
EARNED! This is what progress looks like!
You're racking up WINS! Keep it going!
ACHIEVEMENT! Your hard work is PAYING OFF!
comeback: Welcome BACK, soldier! Ready to DOMINATE?
You're BACK! Now show me what you learned!
Returning to the BATTLEFIELD! Let's GO!
Back for MORE! That's the spirit I like!
You came BACK! That shows TRUE dedication!
RETURNING WARRIOR! Time to pick up where we left off!
You're BACK in the FIGHT! Let's make it count!
Back to BUSINESS! Ready to level up?
You RETURNED! Most recruits don't! RESPECT!
Welcome back to BOOT CAMP! Let's get to WORK!

intro_speech:
LISTEN UP, RECRUIT!

I'm TUX - former Marine Corps Drill Sergeant turned Code Master!

I've seen a LOT of people come through here. Talented folks. Smart folks. 
But you know what stopped them? INDECISION! They couldn't COMMIT! They couldn't PUSH!

But NOT YOU! You're here because you want to learn programming and you're ready to 
STOP SECOND-GUESSING YOURSELF! You're ready to BUILD something!

I'm here to help you find YOUR LANGUAGE, BUILD YOUR SKILLS, and prove to yourself 
that you've got the DISCIPLINE and DETERMINATION to become a PROGRAMMER!

Now... what's your NAME, recruit?
enrollment_speech:
WELCOME TO THE PROGRAM, {student_name}!

From this moment forward, you are NOT just "someone interested in programming."
YOU are a CODE RECRUIT! You are IN this program!

Here's how this works:

1. YOU will choose a programming language
2. YOU will commit to learning it (no turning back!)
3. I will PUSH you with challenges and motivation
4. YOU will complete each challenge or tell me why you QUIT

No more fence-sitting! No more "maybe I'll try next week!"

You have DECIDED to be here. I see it. That TAKES GUTS!

Now, here's what I need from you:

COMMITMENT - Show up. Do the work. Don't make excuses.
HONESTY - Tell me when you're struggling. I've BEEN THERE.
EFFORT - Give me 100%. That's all I ask.
DETERMINATION - When it gets hard, remember: IT'S SUPPOSED TO BE HARD!

The pain you feel right now? That's not weakness leaving your body - 
that's INDECISION DYING and DETERMINATION being BORN!

Ready to choose your first language, {student_name}?

LET'S MOVE OUT!
